name: Penguin - Tastes like chicken!
description:
This game idea came together at 4pm on Saturday after I got people to play a game we call "Bar/Baher", or "Land/Sea", where someone screams "bar!" and you jump to the land, or "baher!" and you jump to the sea. Considering no one can scream it, this idea came together instead :D
This was completed in 11 hours, with some assets used (credits in the game)
